attributes.action: government declared illegitimate while police investigate election expresses.
attributes.background: While police investigate if the government bought the narrow majority by way of overspending in marginal seats and declaring these expenses national the government should be regarded as illegitimate and all major bills and contentious legislation would be illegitimate, including the referendum bill.

rejection.details: There is no mechanism for the Government or legislation passed by Parliament to be declared illegitimate in the way requested by the petition.
